title: Concept Mapping Workshop for Designing [K-12] Mobile Learning Core Concepts

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational theory knowledge and experience using mobile devices
context.additional_context: Environment requiring collaborative activities using personal smart devices. Focuses on developing practical cases for applying mobile learning to language education settings.

learning_goals: Learners can represent the five core concepts of mobile learning (accessibility, contextual learning, coordination of cross-contextual learning, personalization, and collaboration) as a concept map
Learners can transform the core concepts of mobile learning into applicable forms for language education scenarios
Learners can verify the logical consistency of concept maps through peer assessment and feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
